test.name: Does the TA's metadata policy for an OP contain a correct request_authentication_methods_supported parameter key
test.description: In order to check the compliance of a metadata policy issued by the TA, an entity statement for an OP must be fetched in the TA's fetch endpoint. Once obtained the entity statement, the metadata_policy parameter is taken and the request_authentication_methods_supported parameter inside the openid_provider type is checked. It must contain the key 'value'
